Name: Azure Cocktail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: A tangy cocktail that's reminiscent of a cinnamon-laced apple pie. Shame it's not blue.
History: Ben Reed created this cocktail in 1998 at the Met Bar in London, England. It was originally named the Azure Martini and was made with muddled fresh apple.
Nutrition: One serving of Azure Cocktail contains 195 calories
